title: 1001 Submissions Din Thomas 22 DVD set
description:
1001 Submissions - The DVDs, is the fight industry's largest instructional DVD set, by a large margin; an unprecedented 52 volumes of submissions, from everywhere! No cheesy finger locks or oil checks here; these submissions are used by elite grapplers & Mixed Martial Arts fighters all over the world.

The host of 1001 Submissions - The DVDs, is Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu black belt & professional MMA fighter, Din Thomas. Din has beaten some of the best fighters in the world and he'll show you the secrets to bring your submission game up to a level you've never imagined. 

Contents:
 
THE BASICS - 2 DVDS - 5 volumes 

DISC #1: INTRO-STANDING & GROUND CONTROL
-Volume 1 - 1001 Submissions intro
-Volume 2 - Standing control
-Volume 3 - Ground control

DISC #2: COMMON SUBMISSIONS & SETUPS
-Volume 4 - Intro to submissions
-Volume 5 - Submission setups

SUBMISSIONS FROM THE TOP - 6 DVDS - 18 volumes 

DISC#3: SCARF HOLD POSITIONS
-Volume 6 - Scarf hold
-Volume 7 - Modified scarf hold
-Volume 8 - Reverse scarf hold

DISC #4: SIDE CONTROL POSITIONS
-Volume 9 - Basic side control
-Volume 10 - Both arms past - Chokes & neck cranks
-Volume 11 - Both arms past - Arm locks, leg locks & exotics
-Volume 12 - Near hip control

DISC #5: KNEE ON STOMACH & GIFT WRAP
-Volume 13 - Knee on stomach
-Volume 14 - Gift wrap

DISC #6: MOUNT POSITIONS
-Volume 15 - Mount - Arm locks & leg locks
-Volume 16 - Mount - Chokes & neck cranks
-Volume 17 - Reverse mount
-Volume 18 - North-south

DISC #7: REAR MOUNT POSITIONS
-Volume 19 - Rear mount facing down
-Volume 20 - Rear mount facing up
-Volume 21 - Rear mount seated

DISC #8: SPRAWL & TURTLE CONTROL
-Volume 22 - Sprawl
-Volume 23 - Turtle control
                  
SUBMISSIONS FROM THE BOTTOM - 1 DVD - 2 volumes

DISC #9: SUBMISSIONS FROM THE BOTTOM
-Volume 24 - Arm locks, chokes & neck cranks
-Volume 25 - Leg locks

SUBMISSIONS FROM THE GUARD - 2 DVDS - 6 volumes 

DISC #10: HALF, BUTTERFLY & OPEN GUARDS
-Volume 26 - Half guard
-Volume 27 - Butterfly guard
-Volume 28 - Open guard - Chokes
-Volume 29 - Open guard - Arm locks, leg locks & exotics

DISC #11: CLOSED GUARD
-Volume 30 - Arm locks, leg locks & exotics
-Volume 31 - Chokes & neck cranks

SUBMISSIONS FROM TOP GUARD - 1 DVD - 2 volumes 

DISC #12: SUBMISSIONS FROM TOP GUARD POSITIONS
-Volume 32 - Top half & butterfly guards
-Volume 33 - Top open & closed guards
            
SUBMISSIONS FROM THE KNEES - 1 DVD - 2 volumes

DISC #13: SUBMISSIONS FROM THE KNEES
-Volume 34 - Arm locks, leg locks & exotics
-Volume 35 - Chokes & neck cranks

SUBMISSIONS FROM STANDING - 1 DVD - 2 volumes 

DISC #14: SUBMISSIONS FROM STANDING
-Volume 36 - Arm locks & leg locks
-Volume 37 - Chokes & neck cranks
 
SUBMISSIONS FOR MMA - 3 DVDS - 6 volumes  

DISC #15: TOP POSITIONS
-Volume 38 - Knee on stomach, side control & front headlock
-Volume 39 - Mount, rear mount & turtle control

DISC #16: CLOSED GUARD
-Volume 40 - Closed guard - Chokes & neck cranks
-Volume 41 - Closed guard - Arm locks & leg locks

DISC #17: STANDING & OPPONENT CONTROL
-Volume 42 - Standing
-Volume 43 - Opponent control

COUNTERS & COMBOS - 3 DVDS - 6 volumes

DISC #18: COUNTER SUBMISSIONS
-Volume 44 - Counter submissions

DISC #19: ARM LOCKS, LEG LOCKS & EXOTIC COMBOS
-Volume 45 - Straight arm lock combinations
-Volume 46 - Bent arm lock combinations
-Volume 47 - Leg lock & exotic combinations 

DISC #20: CHOKES & NECK CRANK COMBOS
-Volume 48 - Triangle choke combinations
-Volume 49 - Other chokes & neck crank combinations

SUBMISSION DEFENSE - 2 DVDS - 3 volumes
 
DISC #21: POSITIONAL DEFENSE
-Volume 50 - Positional defense

DISC #22: SUBMISSIONS DEFENSE
-Volume 51 - Core submissions defense
-Volume 52 - Other common submissions defense
